citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 on
05-Mar-19.
No responsible adult was available at the site. Talked with owner via phone call, she was not available for at least 2
hours.
